I changed the recipe slightly, going 1/2 mushroom soup and 1/2 cheddar cheese soup as my children aren't enthusiastic about mushroom soup. It turned out fantastic. It will become a family tradition from now on.",

It was fabulous, creamy and comforting. The kids thought it was just good, but I knew it was also good for them.  It turned out fantastic. It will become a family tradition from now on.Thanks!",

        "comment": "I double the recipe, because we love the leftovers. I use cooked fresh green beans or frozen (never canned).         "comment": "I double the recipe, because we love the leftovers. I use cooked fresh green beans or frozen (never canned).
